roadmap.name: HTML
roadmap.description: Learn the basics of HTML and how to create forms. This will be the foundation of your web development journey.
roadmap.materials: Recommended Book: 'HTML and CSS: Design and Build Websites' by Jon Duckett
roadmap.projects: redirect to project page with filter

subtasks.description: Learn the basic structure of an HTML document.

subtasks.description: Explore essential HTML tags and their usage.

subtasks.name: IDs and Classes
subtasks.description: Understand how to use IDs and classes in HTML elements.

roadmap.name: CSS
roadmap.description: Learn how to style your HTML elements with CSS. You will also learn about responsive web design.
roadmap.materials: Recommended Book: 'CSS Secrets' by Lea Verou
roadmap.projects: redirect to project page with filter

subtasks.name: CSS Selectors
subtasks.description: Learn different CSS selectors for styling elements.
subtasks.projects: redirect to project page, search for the project

subtasks.name: Box Model
subtasks.description: Understand the CSS box model and its properties.
subtasks.projects: redirect to project page, search for the project

subtasks.name: Flexbox and Grid
subtasks.description: Explore CSS Flexbox and Grid for layout design.
subtasks.materials: CSS Tricks - A Complete Guide to Flexbox
subtasks.projects: redirect to project page, search for the project

roadmap.name: JavaScript
roadmap.description: Learn the basics of JavaScript and how to manipulate the Document Object Model (DOM).
roadmap.materials: Recommended Book: 'Eloquent JavaScript' by Marijn Haverbeke
roadmap.projects: redirect to project page with filter

subtasks.name: Variables and Data Types
subtasks.description: Learn about variables and different data types in JavaScript.
subtasks.projects: redirect to project page, search for the project

subtasks.name: Control Flow and Loops
subtasks.description: Understand how to control the flow of your JavaScript code.
subtasks.projects: redirect to project page, search for the project

subtasks.name: DOM Manipulation
subtasks.description: Explore manipulating the Document Object Model (DOM) with JavaScript.
subtasks.projects: redirect to project page, search for the project

roadmap.name: React.js
roadmap.description: Learn how to build interactive user interfaces with React.js. You will also learn about state management with Redux.
roadmap.materials: Recommended Book: 'React Quickly' by Azat Mardan

roadmap_suggestions.title: AI Researcher
roadmap_suggestions.overview: Roadmap for becoming an AI Researcher with a focus on AI, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning technologies
learning_objectives: Understand deep learning architectures and algorithms
Implement neural network models using PyTorch
Explore advanced machine learning concepts and techniques
prerequisites: Solid understanding of Python, programming, and data structures
Familiarity with Next.js, React.js, Node.js for web development
sample_courses: Neural Networks and Deep Learning on Udemy
